channel.title: NYS:JHG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:JHG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Janus, BlackRock Among Managers to Lose Dutch Credit Mandates
item.description: BlackRock Inc. is among a group of money managers to have lost credit mandates from one of Europe’s largest pension funds, according to people familiar with the matter.
